Name: The Wraith of the Galaxy
About the game: The Wraith of the Galaxy is a third-person space combat game. The player will control a spaceship equipped with several types of weapons. Destroy mutants, asteroids, explore new planets. The Story Aliens have taken over outer space in order to conduct experiments on entire planets. Destroy them or they will destroy you. Game Features: 1) Colorful and stunning space views 2) Various enemies 3) Several types of weapons 4) Spaceship with controls like in flight simulators 5) 6 interesting missions 6) Mesmerizing soundtrack
